chapter.title: Developing web applications with JavaConfig
chapter.para: JavaConfig provides several support classes for bootstrapping your configurations into the web tier. With various combinations of JavaConfigWebApplicationContext, JavaConfigDispatcherServlet and JavaConfigContextLoaderListener, you can achieve XML-free web application configuration.
